official_title: To require the Secretary of Commerce to convey to the Commonwealth of Massachusetts the National Marine Fisheries Service laboratory located on Emerson Avenue in Gloucester, Massachusetts.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance by the Secretary of Commerce to the Commonwealth of Massachusetts of the National Marine Fisheries Service laboratory located on Emerson Avenue in Gloucester, Massachusetts.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Commerce to convey to the Commonwealth of Massachusetts the National Marine Fisheries Service laboratory located on Emerson Avenue in Gloucester, Massachusetts.
